code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const maxWidthClasses={sm:'max-w-2xl',md:'max-w-3xl',lg:'max-w-4xl',xl:'max-w-5xl','2xl':'max-w-6xl','full':'max-w-full'};const Container=_ref=>{let{children,className='',maxWidth='lg'}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 py-8 ".concat(maxWidthClasses[maxWidth]," ").concat(className),children:children});};export default Container;
